conventions.file_naming: PascalCase for Vue components (e.g., `MyComponent.vue`), camelCase for other JavaScript files (e.g., `myModule.js`).
conventions.code_style: Follows standard Vue.js and JavaScript conventions. Uses Composition API in Vue components. State is managed using `ref` and `reactive`.
conventions.commit_messages: Conventional Commits standard (e.g., `feat: add new feature`, `fix: correct a bug`).
